multi-epoch-training-spec.description: Pattern specification for multi-epoch offline training with statistics tracking

spec-md-format.description: Standardized specification format with YAML frontmatter and detailed statistics

zero-confidence-patterns.description: Pattern tracking system that initializes patterns with 0% confidence before validation

progressive-confidence-building.description: Patterns start at 0% confidence and increase through validation and usage

comprehensive-pattern-metadata.description: Rich metadata tracking for pattern lifecycle including timestamps and statistics

earn-confidence-through-evidence.description: Patterns must prove their value through observations rather than starting with high confidence

transparent-pattern-tracking.description: All pattern metadata including observations and confidence are publicly visible

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file paths and descriptions
